title: MSFS 2020 5th Anniversary: The Dornier Do 24 & City Update 12 (Berlin or Hamburg)?
description:
Join us as we celebrate the 5th anniversary of Microsoft Flight Simulator 2020! It's been an incredible five years of groundbreaking technical updates, massive World Updates, and a constant stream of new aircraft. In this video, we take a deep dive into the numbers and milestones that have shaped the sim since its launch.

But that's not all‚Äîwe're also looking to the future! With Gamescom just around the corner in Germany, we'll be analyzing the clues and speculating on what's next. Will we finally see a massive photogrammetry update for a new German metropolis like Berlin or Hamburg? And is the next Local Legend, LL21, going to be the iconic, three-engine Dornier Do 24 flying boat?

We break down the technical advancements, discuss the impact of updates like DX12 and WASM, and present our case for the next major content drop. What are you most excited for? Let us know in the comments below!
